gml:Dictionary.gml:description: Soil classification codes as defined by ASTM-D2488 (visual-manual classification). These codes are used as values for the classificationCode property of the Lithology object.
gml:Dictionary.gml:name: DIGGS Soil Classification Codelist Definitions (ASTM D2488)

diggs:Definition.gml:description: % gravel > % sand; ≥15-<50% fines; fines = CH or CL; < 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Clayey gravel

diggs:Definition.gml:description: GC with ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Clayey gravel with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: % gravel ≤ % sand; ≥15-<50% fines; fines = CH or CL; < 15% gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Clayey sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: SC with ≥ 15% gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Clayey sand with gravel

diggs:Definition.gml:description: Silt bordering to clay (ML/CL)
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Clayey silt

diggs:Definition.gml:description: ML/CL with >70-85% fines and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Clayey silt with gravel

diggs:Definition.gml:description: ML/CL with >70-85% fines and % sand ≥ % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Clayey silt with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: > 85% fines; inorganic; low to med. dry strength; none to slow dilatency; low to med. plasticity
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Elastic silt

diggs:Definition.gml:description: MH with >70-85% fines and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Elastic silt with gravel

diggs:Definition.gml:description: MH with >70-85% fines and % sand ≥ % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Elastic silt with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: > 85% fines; inorganic; high to very high dry strength; no dilatency; high plasticity
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Fat clay

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CH with >70-85% fines and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Fat clay with gravel

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CH with >70-85% fines and % sand ≥ % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Fat clay with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: ML/CL with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; < 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly clayey silt

diggs:Definition.gml:description: ML/CL with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly clayey silt with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: MH with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; < 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly elastic silt

diggs:Definition.gml:description: MH with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly elastic silt with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CH with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; < 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly fat clay

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CH with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly fat clay with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; < 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly lean clay

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly lean clay with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL/CH with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; < 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly lean to fat clay

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL/CH with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:identifier: Gravelly lean to fat clay with sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly lean to fat clay with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: OL/OH with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; < 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly organic soil

diggs:Definition.gml:description: OL/OH with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly organic soil with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: ML with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; < 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly silt

diggs:Definition.gml:description: ML with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly silt with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL/ML with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; < 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly silty clay

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL/ML with ≥ 50% to ≤ 70% fines; % sand < % gravel; ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Gravelly silty clay with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: > 85% fines; inorganic; med. to high dry strength; none to slow dilatency; med. plasticity
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Lean clay

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL with >70-85% fines and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Lean clay with gravel

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL with >70-85% fines and % sand ≥ % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Lean clay with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: Clay with borderline compressibility (CL/CH)
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Lean to fat clay

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL/CH with >70-85% fines and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:identifier: Lean to fat clay with gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Lean to fat clay with gravel

diggs:Definition.gml:description: CL/CH with >70-85% fines and % sand ≥ % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:identifier: Lean to fat clay with sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Lean to fat clay with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: > 85% fines; organic
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Organic soil

diggs:Definition.gml:description: OL/OH with >70-85% fines and % sand < % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Organic soil with gravel

diggs:Definition.gml:description: OL/OH with >70-85% fines and % sand ≥ % gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Organic soil with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: Peat, muck, and other highly organic soils.
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Peat

diggs:Definition.gml:description: % gravel > % sand; ≤ 5% fines; poorly graded; <15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Poorly graded gravel

diggs:Definition.gml:description: % gravel > % sand; 10% fines; poorly graded; fines = CL or CH; <15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Poorly graded gravel with clay

diggs:Definition.gml:description: GP-GC with ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:identifier: Poorly graded gravel with clay and sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Poorly graded gravel with clay and sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: GP with ≥ 15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Poorly graded gravel with sand

diggs:Definition.gml:description: % gravel > % sand; 10% fines; poorly graded; fines = ML or MH; <15% sand
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Poorly graded gravel with silt

diggs:Definition.gml:name: Poorly graded gravel with silt and sand

diggs:Definition.gml:name: Poorly graded sand

diggs:Definition.gml:name: Poorly graded sand with silt

diggs:Definition.gml:identifier: Poorly graded sand with silt and gravel
diggs:Definition.gml:name: Poorly graded sand with silt and gravel
